about_the_game:
Mini Mania is a new single player game from Pixel Playground Studio. Set in your Grandad's mysterious Laboratories, Mini Mania has been Nominated as one of the most innovative new games from UWE's Graduates and will offer up to an hours of unique gameplay.

The game is designed to change the way players approach, manipulate, and surmise the possibilities in a given environment; similar to how Portal™'s Portal Gun innovated new ways to leverage an you're environment in any given situation.

Players must solve physical puzzles and challenges by using a shrink ray to manipulate the size of objects, and themselves, through space.

short_description: You are young man, whose grandfather has shrunk down to use a ‘lab rat’ in his size changing experiments. With the crazy genius grandpa constantly watching, you must complete all of the puzzles in front of him if he is to ever to return to full size – and normal life!
